blogPost.excerpt: Devcover is an open-source application that allows developers to create and deploy their portfolio in less than 5 minutes with just their username. Features - Good designed - Google Analytics support - SEO friendly - Mobile friendly - Fully customizable - High performance - Availability to be hired - And much more...
blogPost.body: Devcover is an open-source application that allows developers to create and deploy their portfolio in less than 5 minutes with just their username. Features - Good designed - Google Analytics support - SEO friendly - Mobile friendly - Fully customizable - High performance - Availability to be hired - And much more...
blogPost.title: Devcover - Easiest way to generate a developer portfolio
blogPost.author: Junior Garcia

localize.description: Devcover是一个开源的应用程序，它允许开发人员在不到5分钟的时间内，只用他们的用户名来创建和部署他们的投资组合。特点--设计良好--支持谷歌分析--SEO友好--移动友好--完全可定制--高性能--可被雇佣--还有更多... ...
localize.tagline: 生成开发者投资组合的最简单方法

localize.description: Devcover是一個開源的應用程序，它允許開發人員在不到5分鐘的時間內，只用他們的用戶名來創建和部署他們的投資組合。特點--設計良好--支持谷歌分析--SEO友好--移動友好--完全可定製--高性能--可被僱傭--還有更多... ...
localize.tagline: 生成開發者投資組合的最簡單方法

previous.excerpt: Keep records of all your cash flows in multi-platform application, get notified for actions taken on your transactions, mention the debtor/creditor, analyze your transaction history, view detailed reports and one-one reports and optimize your flow of cash.
previous.title: IOU-Money - Manage and explore your debit and credit transaction flow

localize.description: 在多平台应用中记录您所有的现金流，在您的交易中得到行动通知，提及债务人/债权人，分析您的交易历史，查看详细的报告和一对一的报告，优化您的现金流。
localize.tagline: 管理和探索您的借贷交易流程。

localize.description: 在多平臺應用中記錄您所有的現金流，在您的交易中得到行動通知，提及債務人/債權人，分析您的交易歷史，查看詳細的報告和一對一的報告，優化您的現金流。
localize.tagline: 管理和探索您的借貸交易流程。

next.excerpt: DBT Pal is the easiest, fastest and most intuitive way to track and manage your weekly DBT diary card. Daily tracking of your urges & emotions, journaling, paced breathing exercise & guided meditations, daily reminders & export to therapist.
next.title: DBT Pal - Track urges, emotions guided breathing & therapist export

localize.description: DBT Pal是最简单、最快速、最直观的方式来跟踪和管理你的每周DBT日记卡。每天跟踪你的冲动和情绪，写日记，有节奏的呼吸练习和指导冥想，每天提醒和导出给治疗师。
localize.tagline: 追踪冲动、情绪引导呼吸和治疗师出口。

localize.description: DBT Pal是最簡單、最快速、最直觀的方式來跟蹤和管理你的每週DBT日記卡。每天跟蹤你的衝動和情緒，寫日記，有節奏的呼吸練習和指導冥想，每天提醒和導出給治療師。
localize.tagline: 追蹤衝動、情緒引導呼吸和治療師出口。
